title: Hua Xu Yin - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Ancient China   Appearance Changes   Dreams   Female Protagonist   Second Chance
author: Tang Qi Gong Zi   唐七公子
description:
Once upon a time, in a fallen kingdom, Princess Ye Zhen relied on the jiao-zhu to come back to life. She wandering among the 9 states with the guidance of melodies and weaved dreams for others. There are those who are able to achieve their desires, and those who forfeit their dreams in the face of the bitterness of reality, softly erased.

Creating music from illusion, life and death, flesh and bones, she is the only God of Illusion, reigning over life and death, and yet, she unable to hold onto her own happiness. One again, a chance meeting with the prince of the opposing country, their identities weighing on both sides, fate is heavy. In the end was it a meeting of fate, or the teasing of destiny?>
